data.eml:eml: On the validity of Epeorella Ulmer, 1939 (Ephemeroptera, Heptageniidae) with general considerations on the Heptageniidae of the Sunda Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sartori, Michel (2014): On the validity of Epeorella Ulmer, 1939 (Ephemeroptera, Heptageniidae) with general considerations on the Heptageniidae of the Sunda Islands. ZooKeys 445: 97-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.445.8370, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.445.8370
